humidifier: “Time passed in the blink of an eye.”
luggage, things to take on a trip
to be bulky (the volume is big)
to set the time and go to sleep
the lid doesn’t close very well
to be a little long on both ends
to be in the shape of a square
to be in the shape of a circle
to be in the shape of a triangle
to be groggy in the morning
“It was even better than I expected.”
“I hadn’t heard of that before” (lit. Is there such a thing?)
to have a hard time, to suffer
to use frequently, to use a lot
to kill two birds with one stone
to be representative, to be a good example
to be nice, to be wonderful
to fit right in one’s hand
here and there, in various ways
to transform into, to turn into
to be bad for one’s health
to be strong, to be powerful
to be stacked, to be piled up
to be serious, to be severe
to touch, to feel (with one’s hands)
to be vivid, to be lifelike
to be completely absorbed in V- (doing something)
“so much for (something)” (used when one’s plans are frustrated)
